result.longName: ALTEO Energy Services Public Limited Company

assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: ALTEO Energy Services Public Limited Company generates and sells electricity and heat in Hungary. The company operates through Heat and Electricity Generation, Electricity Generation, Energy Services, Energy Retail, and Others segments. The company offers engineering and project development and management, construction, operation, maintenance, and energy consultancy services. It is also involved in property management; steam supply and air conditioning production; and e-mobility activities, as well as trades in natural gas and electricity. In addition, the company engages in the treatment and disposal of non-hazardous waste; and provision of water collection services, as well as generates electricity from wind turbine, hydropower, and solar power plant. The company was formerly known as ALTEO Energiaszolgaltato Nyilvanosan Mukodo Reszvenytarsasag and changed its name to ALTEO Energy Services Public Limited Company in June 2021. ALTEO Energy Services Public Limited Company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Budapest, Hungary.
